mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_comments (content, user_id, post_id, created_at) VALUES (#{content}, #{userId}, #{postId}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE post_comments SET content = #{content}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE comment_id = #{commentId}
